data.name: UserIndex
desc: specifies service of user defined indexes within a document.

properties.name: CreateFromEmbeddedObjects
desc: determines if embedded objects are included in the index.

properties.name: CreateFromGraphicObjects
desc: determines if graphic objects are included in the index.

properties.name: CreateFromMarks
desc: determines if the document index marks are included in this index.

properties.name: CreateFromTables
desc: determines if tables are included in the index.

properties.name: CreateFromTextFrames
desc: determines if text frames are included in the index.

properties.name: LevelParagraphStyles
desc: contains the interface to access the paragraph style names that are included in this index.

properties.name: UseLevelFromSource
desc: determines if the outline level of the location of the indexed object is used as index level of the index entry.

properties.name: UserIndexName
desc: contains the name of the user index.
